goal: Validate that new artifacts follow established naming patterns in the codebase
description: This is Task 131 in GitHub issue #86 (Architectural Coherence Validator). The check extracts naming patterns from existing codebase artifacts and validates that new artifacts follow similar conventions. Returns CoherenceIssue with IssueType.NAMING for any naming violations.

contains.name: check_naming_conventions
contains.description: Main function that validates naming conventions. Extracts patterns from existing artifacts and checks new artifact names against them. Returns list of CoherenceIssue with IssueType.NAMING for violations.

contains.name: _extract_naming_patterns
contains.description: Analyze existing artifact names to extract naming patterns. Returns dict mapping artifact types to list of patterns found, e.g., {"function": ["get_*", "fetch_*", "create_*"], "class": ["*Service", "*Repository"]}.

contains.name: _validate_artifact_name
contains.description: Validate a single artifact name against established patterns. Returns CoherenceIssue if name does not match patterns, None otherwise.
